videos.description: Dwyane Wade talks about his relationship with LeBron and how after the final buzzer sounded it was emotional knowing the two wouldn't face off again.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Wade ‘thankful’ for LeBron on and off the court) 2018/12/10

videos.headline: Wade 'thankful' for LeBron on and off the court

videos.description: Jalen Rose explains why LeBron James and Dwyane Wade's friendship has changed the competitive atmosphere of the NBA today.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Analysis (Jalen: LeBron and Wade's friendship has shaped current NBA) 2018/12/11 Get Up!
